profile: Doors & More Frameless Shower + Railing Ltd has been in business for well over a decade, specializing in custom frameless shower doors, railings, and nothing else. You can find examples of our workmanship in some of the finest retail stores in Ontario. We offer customers a 3 year limited warranty - the best in the industry. Our showers are completely customized for your needs, from single doors to the most intricate design. We also have protective glass separators to help prevent the spread of viruses. for Please visit www.doorsandmore.ca for more information.

profile:
Whether you are looking for a glass shower door, glass railings, a glass table, or anything else requiring a custom glass solution for your home or office - Glass Ninja is the team for you. In the last decade, our family has perfected the glass manufacturing, cutting and installation process. Our products are of the highest quality at the most economical price point possible. From contractors to property development companies to home decoration institutes to regular homeowners, we love to work with Canadians from all walks of life. It would be an honour and pleasure to be able to work with you on your next home project. 

****
 
PRICE MATCH GUARANTEE: A new glass project can be a big investment – so make sure you get the best price on the market by taking advantage of our Price Match Guarantee. Simply show us a quote from a competing company and we will slash it. And if we can’t, we’ll tell you why.
 
WARRANTY ON ALL PRODUCTS: Get your glass project installed worry-free with our 2-year warranty on installations combined with the 3-year manufacturer’s warranty for all glass products. Full Disclosure: in our 20 years of installing glass solutions, we’ve only had a single customer claim this warranty. Our glass solutions are long-lasting.
 
We look forward to showing you the best custom glass solution for your unique needs. From glass shower doors to glass railings, to storefront glass - our expert team can do it all. And because of our direct-from-manufacturer connections, we are able to offer you the highest quality glass solutions at rates that most competitors cannot touch.  From regular glass doors down to glass that can literally go from transparent to opaque with the flick of a switch, we offer every high-quality glass solution that is on the market. If we do not carry it, then it’s probably not worth your time.
 
Give us a call or send us an email, and one of our friendly ninjas will get back to you at superhuman speeds. Have a beautiful day.

profile:
If you are looking for the finest quality of glass enclosures for your shower room, home or office look no more. Shower Lagoon is a family company for the last 27 years. We have provided our clients (residential & commercial) with loyalty, quality, and dependability. We can design and manufacture any shower glass enclosure and glass doors in our factory using only the best materials. glass entrances, glass railings, frameless sliding system shower glass, glass storefronts, glass partitions, and many more services.
 
We service all of GTA: Toronto, Etobicoke, Mississauga, Woodbridge, Vaughan, and Oakville! 
 
Call us for a free quote and you will not be disappointed! 
905-265-1476

profile:
Welcome to Rosales W&D, the purpose of this site is to assist You with finding the perfect product to Affordably Personalize your home.  With over 10 years experience, we can say that we have mastered our craft.  Our products are showcased around the City in residential homes and private estates.  Every year, thousands of clients choose us for their projects mainly because of our professionalism, attention to detail and our one of a kind buying experience which ensures customer satisfaction every time!  And if you're here, it's because you have not yet found what you're looking for.  We believe it's not enough to simply meet your expectations-we must exceed them.

*****
 
We take great pride in our wide variety of Products & Services such as Window Glass Replacements, Glass Shower Enclosures & Partitions, Mirrors, Glass Railings,
Wrought Iron Inserts, Decorative Glass Inserts, Door Systems etc.

*****
Rosales W&D has been servicing Toronto and the surrounding areas for many years.

*****

Rosales W&D
Delivering Quality to Your Home

profile:
Proweld is your choice for Wrought Iron Railings, Stainless Steel Railings, Glass Railings, Aluminum Railings, Gate, Fence,Indoor,Outdoor.

Pro Weld provides complete welding services, fabrication and mobile welding services. Pro Weld has been serving the Greater Toronto Area communities for over 20 years. We are CWB certified.

The company was established in 1990, with customer service and professionalism in mind.

We provide complete mobile welding and fabrication services. We are equipped to handle large and small, residential and industrial projects.

We are experienced with all types of general welding and specialty welding:

    Certified High Pressure Welders
    Heavy Equipment Repairs
    On site Fabrication
    Welding on Steel, Aluminum, Stainless Steel, Cast Iron and all other metals.

Our company specializes in on-site welding of vehicles, modern, commercial, agricultural, classic and prototype. For larger projects we are pleased to offer workshop facilities using the most modern equipment in a fully insured secure environment.

In addition, we provide an onsite welding service to the Construction, Aero and Marine Industries.

We utilize the full range of welding and Plasma cutting equipment including Mig, Tig and Arc, thereby enabling us to weld or cut a range of materials from Mild Steel and Stainless to Cast and Aluminum.

Here is a sample of completed projects that show a range of welding and fabrication assignments. Please fill out a quotation request form or email us, for a free estimate for your specific requirements. Pro Weld has the experience and expertise to do the job right! Your satisfaction is our number one concern, and we would be happy to handle any welding project from start to finish. Call us to get your project on the right track.

Sincerely,
Tal Drori – President
Pro Weld Ltd.

profile: Northern Glass & Railings is a professional framed and frameless shower enclosure producer and installer in the Greater Toronto Area. Since 2010, we have been producing and installing frameless and framed shower enclosures, custom mirrors, and glass railings. Our main focus is on providing high-quality frameless shower enclosure installations around Mississauga, Brampton, Oakville, Richmond Hill, Toronto, Orangeville, Vaughan, and other areas of Greater Toronto.

profile:
We have been right here for over 20 years now.  That makes us a very well-established glass company that you can rely upon to be here when you need us.  We are a family owned business by owner, Feroz Yaqoobi.  Feroz has carried the traditions of high skilled custom glass and mirror work for residential and commercial work.  We can boast that most of our glass professionals have been working for us for over a decade.  We work hard to keep our employees happy so we can retain the highest quality workers to perform the services for your projects.
When you want a custom glass project to go smoothly, on-time and made of superior materials, you can trust Glass Build Canada.  We’ve made lots of friends out of our customers by providing them with superior products that last longer and perform better.  Our employees’ workmanship shows in the great attention to detail in our work.

profile:
Manufacturers and importers of innovative glass products and hardware for industrial, commercial and residential applications in all over Ontario.

Our aim is to fulfill all your glass needs. Our customers highly regard our range of glass products. Further, our customers appreciate how we tailor their orders to meet their specific requests.

At Art of glass design, we believe in beautiful, sustainable homes with clear lines and natural light from quality glass products.

We aim to be the premier supplier of high performance glass and glazing solutions by providing quality products and an exceptional customer service experience. Customer service remains at the core of our day-to-day operations, and we always aim to be approachable, professional and dependable. At Art of glass design, we understand that as your business grows, so does ours. Over 10 years, our repeat customers have become loyal business partners, based on the reliability and integrity of both our company and our products.

Our trusted reputation for providing a responsive and highly professional service will always ensure you’re looked after, and that you’ll receive the very best service. We’ll even look after your insurance claim – easy!
